data.title: Rituals of Illumination and Elective Affinity in Idrissa Ouedraogo’s Cinematic Legacy
data.meta_description: Rituals of Illumination and Elective Affinity in Idrissa Ouedraogo’s Cinematic Legacy - Volume 61 Issue 3
